title: 10 Countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010
summary: This statistic shows the leading 10 countries worldwide based on uranium consumption in 2017 . In that year , the united states was the largest uranium consumer worldwide , using a total of almost 19000 metric tons of uranium . uranium consumption worldwide uranium is a heavy metal that occurs in many rocks as well as in sea water .
gold: This statistic shows the 10 countries in Asia Pacific with the largest number of Christians in 2010 . 67.07 million Christians lived in China .
